name: e-Merges.com
tag_list: registered-voter-files, identity-authentication, mailing-lists, listcomposer, mailing-list-software, public-records-databases, hunting-lists, watercraft-owner-lists
overview:
e-Merges compiles and publishes 500 million public records every year, ranging from registered voters, hunting/fishing permit holders, pilots, aircraft owners, political campaign donors, watercraft owners and other databases.

The site cleans and enhances the data with attributes like phones and updated addresses. Then, they make it available to relevent permitted or non-restricted clients such as investigative or law enforcement, commercial marketing and political campaigns. Some of the data is currently being evaluated for identity authentication applications.

Their new software, ListComposer enables mailing list owners to offer their mailing lists securely and automatically on the web:

As a web-based tool, it markets lists every hour of every day of the year. Customers can customize lists, generate counts, and even pay and download without ever having to get involved. Firms can license a copy of ListComposer and install it on their servers. Users can use ListComposerâ€™s CRM to manage and store their database including reminders, interface with Word and pre-formated mailing labels.

Nuts & Bolts:

ListComposer is easy to deploy and intuitive As a web-based softwrae designed expressly for selling mailing lists, ListComposer can handle large volumes of data with speed and granularity by embedding a full-featured, relational database. It is a database with high levels of scalability, reliability, security, and high-performance. List Composer is built on top of proven, high quality open source components including Linux, Apache, and MySQL. This SQL compliant, relational database design:

Â· Ensures extremely high efficiency and superior query response time. The time taken for data retrieval usually does not usually exceed 30 seconds, irrespective of the complexity of the query and large volumes of data involved â€“ up to 300 million records.

Â· Ensures high scalability so that database performance is not affected by database size or rapidly growing client base.

Â· Improves Return on Investment by embedding a cost-effective solution without artificial license restrictions on CPU, memory, and servers.

Â· Delivers a Zero Administration solution so that expensive dedicated Database Analyst (DBA) employees do NOT need to be hired.

e-Merges has an advisory Board of Directors and has been unusually profitable since inception. e-Merges is an early stage corporation approaching 1 million dollars.
